title: Riot Logic: Let's make AFK'ers part of the game and count it as a victory;
body:
And not make it a foul like it should be.

3 fouls, u get banned.

That's 12 people f*cked off with you Riot; that shouldn't be: and 1 troll gone - and hopefully taught or with a fixed computer or internet, otherwise exiled .....................indefinitely...................

That's a -11.

You could make it a 0.

Changing your perspective would make that a +1.

replies.body:
You can actually get banned on just 2, you don't need 3.
Or you didn't know there's an automatic ban/penalty system?
